00083             if (!(COND))                             \
00084             {                                        \
00085               stringstream_type ss;                  \
00086               ss << "Assertion \""#COND"\" failed: " \
00087                  << __FILE__ << " line "             \

00090             }

00154   enum ECmdCode
00155   {
00156     // The following are codes for built in binary operators
00157     // apart from built in operators the user has the opportunity to
00158     // add user defined operators.
00159     cmLE            = 0,   
00160     cmGE            = 1,   
00161     cmNEQ           = 2,   
00162     cmEQ            = 3,   
00163     cmLT            = 4,   
00164     cmGT            = 5,   
00165     cmADD           = 6,   
00166     cmSUB           = 7,   
00167     cmMUL           = 8,   
00168     cmDIV           = 9,   
00169     cmPOW           = 10,  
00170     cmAND           = 11,  
00171     cmOR            = 12,  
00172     cmXOR           = 13,  
00173     cmASSIGN        = 14,  
00174     cmBO            = 15,  
00175     cmBC            = 16,  
00176     cmARG_SEP,             
00177     cmVAR,                 
00178     cmVAL,                 
00179     cmFUNC,                
00180     cmFUNC_STR,            
00181     cmSTRING,              
00182     cmOPRT_BIN,            
00183     cmOPRT_POSTFIX,        
00184     cmOPRT_INFIX,          
00185     cmEND,                 
00186     cmUNKNOWN,             
00187   };
